name: Sala - The Hammer
text: This card can only be Summoned by its own effect. If you control a "Sala -" monster: You can send the top 5 cards of your Deck to the GY and Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. If this card is Summoned, destroy 1 monster on the field. If this card leaves the field, destroy all monsters in the Extra Monster Zones. You can only use each effect of "Sala - The Hammer" once per turn.
